name: Rotten Utopia
description:
Let’s hear more about the game!

In one line, Rotten Utopia is a story driven horror game with combat and puzzle elements.
The game is story rich. Every character has their own story to tell and your actions will alter and lead them to new endings.
Like most horror games, be prepared for the incoming attacks and monsters. You will have some items at hand to help fend yourself from the danger.

What is the DEMO?

It is used to get player feedback and make the official version better.
In DEMO, you will experience the memories of FENK and PHIL in the city, and face different problems.

Anything else I need to know?

Rotten Utopia is developed by Team Yume. All contents are original, reuse not allowed.
Dev’s note: Hello, I'm the author of this game,the Team Yume just have one person, and I'm an ordinary college student. Making games is just a personal interest, because everything is done on my own, but I can guarantee that quality and speed are directly proportional. Follow me on Twitter if you like this game, thank you.
Twitter:@ WUK4Wda02LAifIF (Follow me that you can know the progress of the game)
